strapiEvent.name: Latin Dance Adventures
strapiEvent.description:
Dance your way over to Crystal Bridges for the third Latin Dance Adventures — a free evening of Latin music, dancing, performances, and professional lessons from En Fuego Dance & Fitness on Thursday, Jul 13, at 6p.

  • Culture: The evening kicks off at 6p with a performance of Rhythm y MAS, a collection of original songs, scenes, and poems curated by the LatinX Theatre Project.
  • Movement: A 30min beginner’s dance class starts at 7:30p. After the lesson, the dance floor will stay open until 10:30p. Wear your most colorful attire or flower prints in honor of the current exhibition Diego Rivera’s America!

The event is free, but tickets must be reserved in advance. Get yours HERE.
